channel.title: 2006dedication - 2006 remake - need devs
channel.description:
Hello, I'm looking for Developers to help code my rsps I will do all the hosting, advertising etc. I just need coders to add content and to fix bugs, if interested message me on here or leave Skype name in comments if you want to be apart of making possibly a huge rsps for the future
- Braxton owner of 2006Dedication
ps. Game not open for public testing until we find a Developer to add content and fix bugs hopefully we find one soon so we can begin, also looking for web devs to make a 2006 based website message me if you can do this as well, also i think the source is a RuneSource base so you would need to know how to run this unless you have another source you would like to use to code.
Also if one of you is making your own 2006 remake i think if we teamed up making it would make it a lot more effient and we could make a hugee server which is my goal

item.title: 2006dedication - 2006 remake - need devs

item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

I can do your website.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006dedication - 2006 remake - need devs
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

[quote=“Im Gaara, post:2, topic:545966”]I’m not the greatest coder… but if you need any testers, I’ll be happy to help, I love 06 ages of rs, any help needed to make this a success, I’m interested. :)[/quote] Lol Gaara, I think I remember you from so many other remakes that I was a moderator on.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006dedication - 2006 remake - need devs
item.dc:creator: @braxton899 braxton899
item.description:
@braxton899 wrote:

So do I and the key is to give a lot of content and make it not buggy and have all features, if i get it 100% done which not many have done, the server will have a lot of players so a developer is the importance now, because last run i had doing a server and for all the changes i did players didnt like it because things were getting updated all the time but it was like one thing at a time so i would know it worked which when you have like 30 players on a server on alpha testing they don’t like that… so i want to to be presentable when i release it if you have a skype add me because i might need you for staff once we have a website we can list our staff, only if your interesting in doing this if not you dont have to message me. Thanks.

Read full topic
